channel.title: Need help plz
channel.description: yea im new at making a server i wanna know do i gotta buy a server? are there free servers i can use?to helpme get on the game i have no idea what im doing tbh plz help me

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @samanthapk samanthapk
item.description:
@samanthapk wrote:

hey lol i fucked up my whole pc good thing i got a ibm think pad lol or els i would of been fucked lol i had to restart pc from factory state so now i gotta re dl easyrsc lol but thanks for everything i fucked it up trying to fix the spite editer lol the one from ur formes thing lol i dl the ant thing and put it in place then my java wouldnt work so i re dl java but still didnt work well my java workng now so ima restart on my project what u think of the name lovemy3hitrsc? i like it but tell me if u guys like it not thanks bye[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 01:48:34 am[/size][hr]hey i cant seem to change the colour of a chicken i change the things u told me to on both server and client but its not working why?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 01:55:19 am[/size][hr]btw i wanna make it with green and blk but it dont work how do i fix the colour thing?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 07:18:02 pm[/size][hr]ok i need help again i wanna add d items to my game and other rares like a blk mask and grey i get them on game but when i try to wear the d items it wont let me and when i put on mask or lend axe it freeezes my client i set up the items.rscd file and itemdef.hml i put it all together already im stuck help me plz?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 08:18:20 pm[/size][hr]i also compiled my server now it wont work what did i do wrong i compiled it because i changed loc on a npcand it didnt show up well i dont know what to do now help plz my server wont even lunch what did i do wrong ?

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Download a compression tool. There should be a link somewhere in the tutorial I made.

Copy and paste the rscd into the input file (in the compression tool), hit decompress all.bat, go into the output folder and then you’ll be able to edit it.

Once edited, copy and paste the edited one (from output) into the input folder and hit the compress all.bat. Then go back into output and copy and paste it back into your client – conf folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“rscpkftw, post:23, topic:304236”][quote author=samanthapk link=topic=400527.msg2970239#msg2970239 date=1253917403]
need help on one more thing plz can i use my own ip to host this game? i got a aircard but also how do i change color of npcs and stats of weapons???
[/quote]

you type in the ::changecolour (colour) command in game, and ::changestat (weapon id) (stat)

good luck![/quote]

You can clearly see that samanthapk is new to this, and you continue to make such hideous remarks that are complete bullshit.

It takes what, a few seconds to make a post that actually is correct, in order for samanthapk to learn something.

Either fuck off back to RS2 or don’t post at all if you don’t know what you’re on about.

@samanthapk, yes, you can use your own IP and default gateway to allow others to connect to your server. That way, you wont have to pay anything. However, I don’t think you’d get many players.

As for changing NPC colours, open your NPCDef.xml file and take a look at the following:

    <hairColour>3158064</hairColour>
    <topColour>16711680</topColour>
    <bottomColour>16711680</bottomColour>
    <skinColour>9461792</skinColour>

What ever you change in the NPCDef.xml file, will also need changing client side in your NPCs.rscd file. (you will need to decompress it first before you can change it).

As for the stats on items, that will be in your ItemWieldableDef.xml file. Take a look for:

			<armourPoints>0</armourPoints>
			<weaponAimPoints>8</weaponAimPoints>
			<weaponPowerPoints>6</weaponPowerPoints>
			<magicPoints>0</magicPoints>
			<prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints>
			<rangePoints>0</rangePoints>

Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

You’re welcome.

Give your friends the download link and get them to download it so they have the files too.

Nope, KBD wont be in the original place. Take a look at the NpcLoc.xml file. You’ll need to make the levers work too. So take a look at the ObjectTelePoints.xml file too.

Once you open them, they’re quite self explanatory.

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“samanthapk, post:15, topic:304236”]thanks just got it i owe u one yong u wanna code for me lol
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2009, 10:39:34 am[/size][hr]oh btw how do i make my ingame guy the admin?[/quote]

Go to the server folder and then into the players folder. Find the name of the guy you want to make admin, open it up in wordpad or notepad. Search for:

rank=0

Change that to:

rank=4

item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Right click on Run Server.bat and click edit. Then make it look like:

@echo off
TITLE NOOBscape
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
ant runserver
exit

Now right click on run_client.bat and click edit. Then make it look like:

@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11
ant runclient
pause

Of course if you have a more updated jdk, then change the “jdk1.6.0_11”

Hope this helps. Good luck.

Read full topic

Download EasyRSC for free here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

That is all you will need to download to be able to start creating your own server.

Also if you look through the development section, there are quite a few tutorials that you can follow to edit stuff within your server.

Good luck.
